Returns the distance between {{c|first}} and {{c|last}}, or between the beginning and the end of the range {{c|r}}.

@1@ If {{c|SizedSentinel&lt;S, I&gt;}} is satisfied, equivalent to {{c|return last - first;}}. Otherwise, returns the number of increments needed to get from {{c|first}} to {{c|last}}. If {{range|first|last}} does not denote a range, then {{tt|I}} and {{tt|S}} must be the same type and must model {{rconcept|SizedSentinel}}, and {{range|last|first}} must denote a range. Otherwise, the behavior is undefined.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|return ranges::distance(ranges::begin(r), ranges::end(r));}}.
@3@ Equivalent to {{c|return ranges::size(r);}}.

Instantiating overloads {{v|2,3}} may be ill-formed if the header {{header|experimental/ranges/range}} is not included before the point of instantiation.

{{cpp/experimental/ranges/cpo}}

===Return value===
The distance between {{c|first}} and {{c|last}}, or between the beginning and the end of the range {{c|r}}.
